The sleek black bot drew a smile on his face. He was weak. He had been 
through one battle prior to this one and had not taken the time to 
heal up.

Blackfang: Thanks Jack. I hope this does save me...

He falls unconscious, but not yet in stasis lock.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Picking up the signal from Blackfang, Wheeljack-X does a quick 180 
> and races to his new comrade's side.  Switching to robot mode, he 
> launches a pair of rockets for cover fire (REGULAR, OLD-FASHIONED 
> MISSILES, THANK YOU VERY MUCH), then scoops Blackfang up in his arms 
> and ignites his rocketpack, soaring up, up, and away from the battle 
> zone.
> 
> "Hold tight, friend," he tells his passenger, "we're going home!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Just as Blackfang turned around to see what was going on with 
> Rodimus, 
> > he received the full force of all the shots sent by perceptor dead 
> > center. He was thrown back several meters and fell hard on his 
side.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Uuuhh... (he managed to open his comm) Blackfang 
here... 
> I 
> > need some evac... situation is bad...
